WRITING.TEXT: Thank you! I most certainly can't. He is not deaf :)

This was the first time I caught him on the fridge! His favorite kitchen spot is the sink basin just after I do the dishes. Something about an empty sink haha. He is only 9 months old still, were still working on the rules it seems ;)

Thank you! He gets hours of cuddles every day. He is my first cat and I'm pretty sure he is abnormally cuddly; I've read that cats tend to bite or scratch after their fill of belly rubs but he is just the biggest sack of snuggles around!
Haha he uses the countertop to get all the way up there, which he is not allowed on. Naughty used lightly, I thought it was funny

WRITING.TITLE: I went to the kitchen for a midnight snack and heard a soft "mew" right in my ear. Someone was sleeping on the fridge! Naughty kitty

WRITING.TEXT: My boyfriend and I were camping at a state park where you'd have to go online and reserve a lot and pay a fee (about $20/night). They then put a little sign on the post in front of the site with the reservation details. We went during an off-season, so both of the lots on either side of us were not reserved. At about 9pm an RV chugs into the lot next to us. "That's weird, it wasn't reserved," I thought. Then we didn't think much else of it. We went about making our fire and roasting hotdogs/ s'mores. Later that night when we were laying down in our tent, we heard the phone ring of the person in the RV. She picked up and started talking about the spiders she's been collecting for her "spider stew". She said she had found plenty on the site and it's going to be a good batch. My bf and I both turned to each other to see if the other was hearing the same conversation. When we woke up the next morning at 6:30 she was already gone. Anyway, that's got to be the strangest convo I've overheard.
